contextId.information: These phrases describe words that are both good and comforting. AT: "encouraged me" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_hendiadys]])
contextId.quote: talked with me, with good words, words of comfort

contextId.information: "there will only be one God, Yahweh, who will be worshiped." (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_hendiadys]])
contextId.quote: there will be Yahweh, the one God, and his name alone
